function.name: list_all_qr_code_s_for_qr_code_dynamic_and_static
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "qr_code_dynamic_and_static", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "From this endpoint is to list all registered qr codes, related to their api key."

function.name: generate_api_key_for_qr_code_dynamic_and_static
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "qr_code_dynamic_and_static", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "From this endpoint you can generate a single api key.

It will be used to link all the qr code created, and allow any changes.

Important: Keep in mind that once generated, it is necessary that you store this key well, since it is not possible to recover i"

function.name: list_specific_qr_code_for_qr_code_dynamic_and_static
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "qr_code_dynamic_and_static", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "From this endpoint is to get the information of a specific registered qr code, related to the respective api key"

function.name: tts_for_text_to_speech_api
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "text_to_speech_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "takes text & languages code  and returns as **.mp3** format"

function.name: reverse_dns_lookup_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Find the reverse DNS entry (PTR) for a given IP. This is generally the server or host name."

ip.description: the IP address to retrieve the reverse DNS record for

function.name: whois_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Displays owner/contact information for a domain name. Can also be used to determine if a domain name is registered or not.  This tool is not available to free API key users. Access is restricted to paid API keys only."

domain.description: the domain to perform a whois lookup on

function.name: port_scanner_for_viewdns
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "viewdns", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This web based port scanner will test whether common ports are open on a server. Useful in determining if a specific service (e.g. HTTP) is up or down on a specific server.   Ports scanned are: 21, 22, 23, 25, 80, 110, 139, 143, 445, 1433, 1521, 3306 and 3"

host.description: the host to perform the port scanner on (domain or IP address)

function.name: capture_for_website_screenshot_or_thumbnail
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "website_screenshot_or_thumbnail", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Capture screenshot from any URL or Raw HTML. POST method is also available. Please take a look https://restpack.io/screenshot/docs"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: I'm developing a website and need to capture screenshots of different pages for testing. Can you capture screenshots of multiple URLs? Additionally, please provide me with the text-to-speech conversion of the HTML content of these pages.
